document.topic_text: Deals of the Day (4-25-2016) 04/25/2016 Not sure if a Windows smartphone is right for you? How about two Windows smartphones? This week Microsoft is offering a free Lumia 950 smartphone when you buy a Lumia 950 XL . Both phones run Windows 10 Mobile, feature USB-C ports, and support an optional display dock that lets you connect an external screen, keyboard and mouse to run desktop-style apps using Microsoft’s Continuum for phone feature. Microsoft Store Here are some of the day’s best deals. Smartphones
